newGuild._3: We’ll help keep your community safe, positive, and well-protected ✅

embed.title: 🫂 Support Stachio
embed._1: Stachio is built to keep your community safe and thriving! 💚
embed._2: If you’d like to support ongoing development, consider donating via Ko-fi:

tips._1: `💡` Use `/report` to quickly alert Watchdog staff about potential risks.
tips._2: `💡` Stachio automatically blocks known phishing links.
tips._3: `💡` Support Stachio on Ko-fi to help fund hosting, development, and new features.
tips._4: `💡` Keep your moderation logs channel private to ensure sensitive data stays secure.
tips._5: `💡` Stachio continuously runs in the background with global bans, phishing protection, and detailed moderation logs.

embed.title: 📖 Stachio Help Menu
embed._1: Welcome to **Stachio** — your all-in-one community guardian.
embed._2: Use the commands below to get started and explore what Stachio can do for your server.
embed._7: 🔹 **/report** - Submit a safety or moderation report
embed._15: If your account is identified and you wish to appeal, please visit our official Discord server:

embed.title: 📩 Invite Stachio
embed._1: Thanks for choosing **Stachio** — your trusted community guardian! 💚
embed._2: With Stachio, your server benefits from:
embed._3: - `👁️` **Watchdog**: Global ban protection against repeat offenders
embed._5: - `📑` **Report System**: Members can raise issues for review
embed._6: - `⚖️` **Appeals**: Fair review process for identified accounts
embed._8: Click below to invite Stachio and strengthen your community’s safety today!

reply.success: `✅` Your report against **{{reported_username}}** has been submitted with **{{screenshots_length}}** screenshot(s). Staff will review it shortly.
reply.error: `❌` Something went wrong while submitting your report. Please try again later.

embed.title: 🗳️ Vote for Stachio
embed._1: Help **Stachio** grow by upvoting us on the bot lists below!
embed._2: Every vote helps us reach more communities 💙
